page.title: 16Eppleby Gala ST
page.content: Eppleby Gala was first started in 1900 and funds are raised by donations, raffles and dances. The events that they do are Gymkhana, sports, and fancy dress. For the{children's tea}we have cakes, sandwiches, buns, biscuits and a drink of orange. Mr. Chapman gives us 20p and a packet of crisps. At the{Gymkhana}there is horse-jumping and a game called the musical sack race and the potato race. The next day is a{children's sports {day}and the races are potato race, egg and spoon race, sack race, obstacle race and high jump. The{fancy dress}is next and the winner wins a cup. In the village hall they have a{Show}with classes for horticulture, home produce knitting and handicrafts. There are also farmers' and childrens' classes. Shipleys or Cowies{fair}comes and the gala lasts for two days.
